controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Updates the model based on the input received by the view Will call the DataController to make changes to relevant components of the model
    Author:
    Nolan Slade

      • setUserData

        public static void setUserData(java.lang.String[] data)
        Calls the data accessor to update data in the model, then view is told what to show User data is updated based on new preferences; then results are retrieved from the model

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getVehicleResults()

        Returns:
        An array list of string arrays containing the top 5 vehicle information (make/model/fuel consump/fuel cost/satisfaction)
